channel.title: Particle
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2dqnhc7.png[/img][b]Current:[/b] Working on Combat System.[/CENTER]
[i]Well, Devo and me do not mix well. RS001 failed hard with all the bugs with Single-threaded... so, I am doing something cool.[/i]
WinterLove, no, not a derivative, thee winterLove. I see a whole lot of people who are put off by WinterLove because it's packaged, basic, and just not "friendly." Personally, I believe that is a big lie. Packaging is better in my eyes. But, lets take a step back and make this user friendly for these people.
Single-threaded, EventManager... Things like this (Btw, thanks for those Graham!) make advances, and help winterLove allot. So, the goal... Get this to a stable, small form factor, and release. Get the minimums, get them right the first time, get them working.
[b]Update Log[/b] -Single-Threaded (Thanks to Graham) August 19th, 2009 -Instancing (Graham again) August 19th, 2009 -Unpackaged/Repackaged August 19th, 2009 -NPC's finally Supported August 26th, 2009 -Re-did a few methods August 26th, 2009 -Added some Noclip fixes August 26th, 2009 -Began writing a Handled Combat system August 26th, 2009 -Project Renamed to "Particle"
[b]Pictures:[/b] Just to show how clean it is: http://i25.tinypic.com/11w3puf.png

item.description:
@Tree_Climber wrote:

[quote=“Fission, post:1, topic:297167”][CENTER]Current: Working on Combat System.[/CENTER]

Well, Devo and me do not mix well. RS001 failed hard with all the bugs with Single-threaded… so, I am doing something cool.

WinterLove, no, not a derivative, thee winterLove. I see a whole lot of people who are put off by WinterLove because it’s packaged, basic, and just not “friendly.” Personally, I believe that is a big lie. Packaging is better in my eyes. But, lets take a step back and make this user friendly for these people.

Single-threaded, EventManager… Things like this (Btw, thanks for those Graham!) make advances, and help winterLove allot. So, the goal… Get this to a stable, small form factor, and release. Get the minimums, get them right the first time, get them working.

Update Log
-Single-Threaded (Thanks to Graham) August 19th, 2009
-Instancing (Graham again) August 19th, 2009
-Unpackaged/Repackaged August 19th, 2009
-NPC’s finally Supported August 26th, 2009
-Re-did a few methods August 26th, 2009
-Added some Noclip fixes August 26th, 2009
-Began writing a Handled Combat system August 26th, 2009
-Project Renamed to “Particle”

Pictures:
Just to show how clean it is:
http://i25.tinypic.com/11w3puf.png[/quote]
wL isn’t packed and stuff.
wL was originally 3 files. then it was developed as blakescape d-boosted.

item.title: Particle
item.dc:creator: @Fission Fission
item.description:
@Fission wrote:

Ofc. It’s unpackaged.
To explain my two long-term projects:
Stabilize and make easy a WinterLove source. Add combat, banking friends, etc, add PlayerSaving NPC’s the basics. Release.

Stabilize, package, redo Devo 7 into a nice source Since so many people love Devo sources, lets make em gewd then.

Read full topic

Good luck, I’m hoping this gets far
